examples: Anthemis maritima ssp. bolosii C. Benedi Gonzalez & J. Molero Briones in  Fontqueria, 28: 1 (1990). Euphorbia arvalis subsp. longistyla (Litard. & Maire)  J. Molero, A.M. Rovira & J. Vicens in An. Jard. Bot. Madrid, 54(1): 218 (1996).
source: IK, Index Herbariorum ed.7. From B.Valdes 2 Jan 1991. Julian is Spanish spelling and Julia is Catalan spelling of the same name.
